summary: A documentary on the Manhattan department store with interviews from an array of fashion designers, style icons, and celebrities.
cast: William Fichtner|Cher|Mary-Kate Olsen|Barbra Streisand|Candice Bergen|Ashley Olsen|David Letterman|Tom Ford|Susan Lucci|Nicole Richie|Joan Rivers|Georgina Chapman|Patricia Field|Heather Ashley Chase|Rachel Zoe|Jill Kargman|Isaac Mizrahi|Barbara Corcoran|Karl Lagerfeld|Vera Wang|Giorgio Armani|Diane von Fürstenberg|Michael Kors|Lauren Bush Lauren|Iris Apfel|Marc Jacobs|Blake Mycoskie|Jean Doumanian|Tory Burch|Christian Louboutin|William Ivey Long|Bobbi Brown|Jason Wu|Robert Verdi|Ally Hilfiger|Oscar de la Renta|Keren Craig|Narciso Rodríguez|Manolo Blahnik|David Hoey|Victoria Roberts|Domenico Dolce|Stefano Gabbana|Thom Browne|Betty Halbreich|Carleton Varney|Elizabeth Hui|Catherine Malandrino|Dawn Mello|Alber Elbaz|Linda Fargo|Patrick McDonald|Gilles Mendel|Candy Pratts|Sidney Toledano|Mariko Ichikawa|Thakoon|Amy Fine-Collins|Sylvia Fendi|Jim Gold|Lynn Yaeger|John Demsey|Johnson Hartig|Elaine Mack|Lorraine Schwartz|Andrew Malloy|Olivier Theyskens|Laudomia Pucci|Robert Duffy|Paul Goldberger|Albert Kriemler|Lela Rose|Kim Cattrall|Kristin Davis|Michael Douglas|John Gielgud|Whoopi Goldberg|Eila Mell|Irving Metzman|Liza Minnelli|Dudley Moore|Cynthia Nixon|Sarah Jessica Parker|Erika Smith|Uma Thurman|Anna Wintour
title: Esparcid mis cenizas en Bergdorf
